item.description:
Why frisbee is cooler than sitting alone at home on a Friday Night:

At frisbee: you play with other people. Discs are in the air, glowing brightly.
Alone at home: you play with yourself. Only one disc is in the air, and it's not glowing.

At frisbee: you're surrounded by pretty people all night long.
Alone at home: you've only got yourself and your cat Mr. Squibbles. And Mr. Squibbles ain't so pretty.

At frisbee: you get to run around all night long in the cold.
Alone at home: there's no running, only loneliness. There's no warmth either in your cold, bitter heart.

At frisbee: you hang out with cool folks afterward.
Alone at home: you go to sleep at the end of the night, miserable and alone, another wasted day.

At frisbee: you talk to cool people.
Alone at home: you talk to yourself and your roommates think you're crazy.

At frisbee: you make friends!
Alone at home: you have no friends.

If you didn't quite get the message, don't stay at home alone and sad. Come to frisbee! We are friendly and fun and sugar and spice and everything nice. 7 PM. Russell Field. Directions can be found on a previous Friday meetup, like this one.

Bring light-colored clothing, a change of socks (and extra clothing/shoes/etc.), your pets and grandparents, water, and money for food afterward!

Chris M outta here.
Call me, 781 301 1791, if you need any help finding the field.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be sitting on the bench alongside the football field or throwing an illuminated disc around.
item.name: Illuminated Frisbee on Russell Field
